attributes.action: demand that the PM calls a General Election ASAP due to the lack of public confidence in Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition aims to demonstrate the lack of public confidence in MPs and Parliament. It wants to demonstrate to MPs that they no longer possess a sense of values or moral compass to rule us.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
